text: Shearith Israel or Sherith Israel (Hebrew: שארית ישראל "Remnant of Israel"), may refer to the following Jewish synagogues: ==Canada== *Spanish and Portuguese Synagogue of Montreal, a Sephardic-Orthodox synagogue, also known as Shearith Israel ==United States== *Congregation Shearith Israel, a Sephardic-Orthodox synagogue, often called The Spanish and Portuguese Synagogue, in New York City. *Congregation Shearith Israel (Wharton, Texas), a defunct synagogue *Congregation Sherith Israel (Nashville, Tennessee), an Orthodox synagogue *Congregation Sherith Israel (San Francisco, California), a Reform synagogue *Sherith Israel Temple (Cincinnati, Ohio), an historic building previously used as a synagogue
title: Shearith Israel
